card_text: 3 Level 8 monsters$NOnce per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects.$N●Target 1 Set Spell/Trap your opponent controls; while this card is face-up on the field, that Set card cannot be activated.$N●Target 1 Plant monster on the field; change that target to face-down Defense Position.$N●Target 1 face-up monster on the field; that target gains 300 ATK.
